QuestData.Title: Lost Armaments
QuestData.Description: The Wretched grow bolder every day, $n. They've achieved enough coordination to launch an attack on Sunsail Anchorage.$B$BAs if that weren't embarrassing enough, most of our weapons were left behind when they attacked. Bring me back our armaments so that we may show those ruffians who's boss.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 8 Sin'dorei Armaments to Velendris Whitemorn in Eversong Woods.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you gather the lost weapons yet?
QuestData.RewardText: Great job, $N. Let's show the Wretched what we're made of!
